text.more:
A graph of important actos in Aum Shinrikyo and the 1995 Tokyo Subway Sarin Attacks. Nodes are colored based on their category. 

Red - Aum Members
Light Blue - Organizations
Yellow - Incidents
Green - Innocents
Black - Train lines

They are sized by Clustering Coefficent, which tends to highlight individuals involved in important incidents
text.intro: A graph of important actos in Aum Shinrikyo and the 1995 Tokyo Subway Sarin Attacks
text.title: Aum Shinrikyo
